Website Terms and Conditions

1. These terms and conditions of use ("terms of use") apply to the entire contents of this website under the domain name www.worldweatheronline.com and any other worldweatheronline website, including the links within these sites to our half hourly online service ("Website") and to any correspondence by e-mail between you and us. Please read these terms of use carefully before using this Website. Using any part of this Website indicates that you accept these terms of use. If you do not accept these terms of use in full, do not use this Website. These terms of use are issued by worldweatheronline.com.

2. worldweatheronline may revise the terms of use at any time by updating this page. You should check this Website from time to time to review the then current terms of use, because they are binding on you. Certain provisions of the terms of use may be superseded by expressly designated terms located on particular pages at this Website.

3. Unless otherwise stated, the copyright and other intellectual property rights in all material on the Website (including without limitation photographs and graphical images) are owned by worldweatheronline or its licensors. Any reproduction or use of extracts from this Website for any purpose is prohibited and may not occur without the express written permission of worldweatheronline. If you breach any of the terms and conditions applying to use of this Website, your permission to use it automatically terminates.

4. From time to time worldweatheronline include hypertext links to websites, which are created by individuals and companies outside worldweatheronline. We do this when there is a particular relevance to the topic you're reading about, for your convenience. If you use these links, you leave this Website. Whilst we endeavour to check that the content of these websites is suitable, worldweatheronline does not control and is not responsible for them or their content. worldweatheronline therefore, does not endorse or make any representations about them, or any material found there, or any results that may be obtained from using them. If you decide to access any of the third party websites linked to this Website, you do so entirely at your own risk.

5. If you would like to link to this Website, you may only do so on the basis that you link to, but do not replicate, the home page or other relevant page of this Website, and subject to the following conditions:

a. you do not remove, distort or otherwise alter the size or appearance of the worldweatheronline logo;

b. you do not create a frame or any other browser or border environment around this Website;

c. you do not in any way imply that worldweatheronline is endorsing any products or services other than its own;

d. you do not misrepresent your relationship with worldweatheronline nor present any other false information about worldweatheronline;

e. you do not otherwise use any worldweatheronline trade marks displayed on this Website without express written permission from worldweatheronline;

f. you do not link from a website that is not owned by you unless you have permission from the owner to do so; and

g. your website does not contain content that is distasteful, offensive or controversial, infringes any intellectual property rights or other rights of any other person or otherwise does not comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

6. worldweatheronline expressly reserves the right to revoke the right granted in paragraph 5 for breach of these terms and to take any action it deems appropriate.

7. You shall fully indemnify worldweatheronline for any loss or damage suffered by worldweatheronline or any of its group companies for breach by you of paragraph 5, except where caused by worldweatheronline's negligence.

8. While worldweatheronline endeavours to ensure that this Website is normally available 24 hours a day, worldweatheronline will not be liable if for any reason this Website is unavailable at any time or for any period.

9. Access to this Website may be suspended temporarily and without notice in the case of system failure, maintenance or repair or for reasons beyond worldweatheronline’s control.

10. We’d like to keep you informed by email about our future offers and new product launches from World Weather Online and our sister companies. You can unsubscribe at any time using the links at the bottom of the emails.
